revision.text:
Present:
* Tobias Czauderna (TC) * Stuart Moodie (SM) * Anatoly Sorokin (AS) * Falk Schreiber (FS)
== SBGN related workshop ==
SM: Funding for a workshop in Edingburgh
Discussion about the best time (around 15/04, beginning of May?)
How long should the meeting be? - 3 days, maybe 4 days (lunch to lunch)
Aim of the meeting: * Kick-start SBGN * Content of next level of SBGN (Level 2)
Decision: * SM will do survey with blocks of possible days
== One day online / skype meeting ==
Decision: * Similar to last one * Including all privious editors * TC will do survey of possible days * February / March
== Other topics (from Alice via mail) ==
* Symbol of the Month... Anyone wants to take responsibility for this? --> FS will discus with NLN
* I need to contact Nicolas Rodriguez if we want to change the look of the wiki (e.g. switch from a dark background to a lighter one)
* Tobias migrated the SBGNML site onto the wiki, but the pages are not prefixed (like a new category) with SBGNML/, so they can't be told apart from the other SBGN pages. Maybe try and fix this? --> TC will discus it directly with AV
* Work on the PD specs: who, when, where, how, ...? (maybe cf below...?)
* Meeting in Edinburgh mentioned by Anatoly a while ago?
== How to increase user base ==
SM: Survey how SBGN is used * More people than on sbgn-discuss
FS: Tutorials at conferences
AS: Put it in email, on facebook etc
FS: (Part of) summer schools
